name: Prison Bros
description:
(When playing in browser, please note the initial Unity loading screen is blank.
Please wait, as it is still loading in the background)

You've made all the plans! The timing is right! Now you just need to make it out! Attempt to break out of prison in this stealth action game, avoiding guards and cameras as you make a daring dash for freedom.

Play as Damian, a prisoner determined to break himself and his bro, Don, out of the big house. Navigate the prison's rooms as you try to reach the outside. Run for your life to reach the getaway car.

Inspired by the Metal Gear and Battletoads series. Enjoy this tense, pixel art escape game with an exciting conclusion. Built for My First Game Jam, Summer 2021. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys

Space Bar

Credits:

Tariq Thomas - Pixel Artist & 2D Animator

Christopher Guay - Programmer & Pixel Artist

Dave Kelly - Programmer & Level/Narrative Designer

Mackievellian -  Composer / SFX
